snippet: The Butler University men's basketball team split a pair of Horizon League games with Wright State and Detroit at home over the weekend.
abstract: The Butler University men's basketball team split a pair of Horizon League games with Wright State and Detroit at home over the weekend.
lead_paragraph: In 2010 and 2011, the Butler Bulldogs were college basketball's favorite Cinderella story. But this season has been a struggle. Matt Rhinesmith, a sports reporter for The Butler Collegian, will file occasional posts for The Quad about the team's efforts to return to the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.main: At Home, a Win and a Loss for Butler
